languages.text: For each enemy that considers the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}, the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +5%.
